name: Tree of Dreams
description:
Tree of Dreams is a 3D zen farming game with relaxing and rewarding gameplay set in a fluffy dreamworld

The Avatar, a Dream Spirit, lives on the Tree of Dreams, which connects our world with the Dreamworld and is the place where the Avatar grows and nurtures dreams.

The dreams then get send through the Tree of Dreams in our world spreading good night sleeps to everybody.

From good sleep the Avatar draws their strength to create new dreams and form their home.

Credit goes to

Game Designer

Christian Leder

Cornelius Nitschkoff 

Engineers

Bryan Printz

Producer 

Paulina Pabst

Artists

Ronja Brodocz

Michelle Lottra

Jessy-Lee Mais

Nadim Chreide

Katarina Stadler

Tree of Dreams is a student project from the School 4 Games. 

We made this Game in one semester and will be happy to hear feedback!

Download will be available at the end of the month!
